attributes.action: make it compulsery for hospitals to have antibacterial fixtures and fittings that kill off superbugs and infections on contact
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: thousands of people are dying each year due to infections and superbugs in hospitals my daughter was 1 of them. we can help prevent these by having antibacterial fixtures and fittings that kill these pathogens on contact. The hospitals dont want to spend there money on these and would rather go for cheaper, unprotected products. we want to make these life saving products compulsery. if you agree please sign our petition.
